entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
